title: Charming Kufri Radisson Stay with Daily Breakfast, Daily Lunch/Dinner & Daily Drinks
description:
Discover the ultimate mountain escape at the luxurious Radisson Kufri, a luxurious hotel nestled in the majestic Himalayan foothills near Shimla. Located in the quaint town of Kufri in Himachal Pradesh, the hotel is surrounded by lush forests, snow-capped mountains and tranquil lakes, offering the perfect setting for a rejuvenating escape. An eight-hour drive from New Delhi and a four-hour drive from Chandigarh Airport (IXC), the serene mountain abode offers a sanctuary for those in search of mountains, greenery and quiet moments. Unwind in the elegant rooms offering stunning views of the valley, entice your tastebuds with a delectable spread of local and international cuisine or sip on great cocktails at the chic Living Room.

With a plethora of picnic spots, lookout points, skiing and trekking trails, Kufri will impress your wanderlust soul easily. Explore nearby attractions, including the iconic Himalayan Nature Park (a 10-minute drive) and the captivating Mahasu Peak (a seven-minute drive). Enveloped by the mighty mountains and cocooned in the lap of the lush valley, Radisson Kufri boasts endearing hospitality and is the perfect place to relax and unwind.
offer_address: 0km Milestone, Kufri, Shimla, Himachal Pradesh 171012 India

title: Luxury Kufri Hill Station Radisson Stay with Daily Breakfast & Dinner
description:
Nestled at the foothills of the great Himalayas and framed by green valleys, Radisson Kufri is a lavish property offering the perfect hill station escape, and approximately an eight-hour drive from Delhi, or a four-hour drive from Chandigarh. Located in the picturesque Kufri in the gorgeous Shimla district, the hotel is a peaceful sanctuary for those in search of mountains, greenery and quiet moments. Making memories is easy while staying here as various picnic spots, lookout points and skiing and trekking trails are right on the doorstep.

Stay in stylish rooms that offer views of the silent mountains and indulge in local and international cuisine at the modern restaurants within the property. Treat yourself to drinks at the tastefully designed Living Room and head out to the famous Mall Road for some browsing and shopping. Soak up stunning views of snow-capped mountains in the winter or lush green summer vistas while enjoying famous Radisson group hospitality.
offer_address: 0km Milestone, Kufri, Shimla, Himachal Pradesh 171012 India

title: Tranquil Five-Star Hillside Hideaway near Shimla with Daily Breakfast & One Dinner
description: Lose yourself in the mesmerising beauty of nature at Royal Tulip Shimla, Kufri Hills, a five-star luxury resort perched on a wooded hillside of Kufri, just a 30-minute drive from Shimla. Stay in the shadow of the majestic Shivalik range in the Himalayas and breathe in the fresh mountain air at this gorgeous hilly hideaway. This stunning hideaway is an overnight drive from Delhi, and boasts large, open spaces, inspiring views of the mountains and valleys and a sense of luxury synonymous with the famed Louvre Hotels Group. Grab your family and friends and experience the healing power of nature at this hilltop hideaway, complete with an indoor heated pool, kids' area, restaurants and spa.
offer_address: National Highway 22, Kufri, Himachal Pradesh 171012, India
